tasks.title: Develop Device Power Strategy
tasks.description: Develop a strategy for low and high power devices using deviceStore. Define thresholds for switching to fallback mode (SVG).

tasks.title: Implement SVG Fallback for Low Power
tasks.description: Implement a fallback layer that renders an SVG of the model instead of the 3D scene for low-power devices. Ensure transition is smooth or initial load selects correct mode.

tasks.title: Rust Code Cleanup & Optimization
tasks.description: Review src/lib.rs and other Rust files. Remove procedural mesh generation (create_sphere_mesh) if unused/replaced by GLB. Remove unnecessary logging (console_log) and update/clean up dependencies in cargo.toml.

tasks.title: Mobile Touch & Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Improve touch interaction performance and responsiveness in both the UI (index.astro) and 3D scene (lib.rs/Renderer).

tasks.title: Optimize Service Workers
tasks.description: Investigate current Service Worker usage (if any) and implement/optimize caching strategies for assets (GLB, textures) to improve load performance on mobile.

tasks.title: Fix Time Display Accuracy
tasks.description: Fix the time display in index.astro to show the actual current system time on load, and ensure updates are accurate (minutes, not just hours).

tasks.title: Audio Store Cleanup
tasks.description: Analyze src/lib/stores/audioStore.ts. Determine if it's still needed for visualization without IAMF. Remove if redundant or refactor.

tasks.title: Review and improve Accessibility
tasks.description: Audit and improve accessibility compliance focusing on ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, and HTML5 landmarks.
tasks.details:
Requirements:
1. Add ARIA labels: Ensure [role]s have all required [aria-*] attributes. Specific target: div#time-display.global-toggle.time-control.
2. Improve keyboard navigation: Ensure interactive controls are keyboard focusable.
3. Interactive elements must indicate their purpose and state.
4. Ensure logical tab order.
5. Visual order on the page should follow DOM order.
6. Prevent accidental focus traps.
7. Direct user focus to new content added to the page.
8. Use HTML5 landmark elements to improve navigation.
9. Hide offscreen content from assistive technology.
10. Ensure custom controls have associated labels and ARIA roles.
tasks.testStrategy: Manual verification using keyboard navigation and screen reader tools (e.g., VoiceOver, NVDA). Code review for ARIA attributes.

subtasks.title: Fix Time Control ARIA Attributes
subtasks.description: Add `aria-valuenow` to `#time-display` and ensure it updates dynamically with JS when the time changes. Also add `aria-valuetext` for human-readable time.

subtasks.title: Improve Toggle Button Accessibility
subtasks.description: Add `aria-pressed` attributes to `#blob-toggle`, `#themeToggle`, and `#modelToggle` where appropriate to indicate state. Ensure all buttons have accessible names.

subtasks.title: Manage Focus/Visibility for Layers
subtasks.description: Implement `inert` or `aria-hidden` toggling for `#layer-back` and `#layer-front` when they are inactive to prevent focus traps in hidden content.

subtasks.title: Improve Document Structure and Landmarks
subtasks.description: Wrap global controls in a `<nav>` or `<aside>` with an aria-label. Ensure proper landmark usage in Layout.astro.

tasks.title: Fix Firefox Dynamic Light Bug
tasks.description: Fix dynamic light/theme issue in Firefox by deferring lighting update.
tasks.details:
The previous fix for dynamic lighting persistence across theme changes worked in Safari but failed in Firefox. This was likely due to a race condition where the theme reset in the renderer overwrote the lighting update.

Fix applied: Wrapped `updateTimeOfDay` in `requestAnimationFrame` within the theme subscription in `Renderer.astro` to ensure it runs after the theme update is processed.
